item.title: DFIR Methodology
item.description: Basically, all of the artefacts listed in the Investigation section fall under the category “user activity” one way or another. Even if some process spawned some other process, somewhere in the past, user interaction was still required. That’s why I find it so hard to find the perfect categorisation. I’ve decided to devote this section to common strategies of how one would investigate user activity and which artefacts they would use at what point in time.
